A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Killing Snoke was a big mistake. He was basically the only interesting\, mystic and powerful character in this new trilogy. Now we are left with emo Kylo Ren as the main bad guy who has already been beaten by Rey in episode 7 with no training at all. The thought of having another Kylo Ren vs Rey battle in the final episode does not make it exciting at all.
